DOC.brief_summary: To establish the clinical performance of the SOLX Gold Shunt for its ability to reduce intraocular pressure (IOP) in eyes with refractory glaucoma where medical and conventional surgical treatments have failed.
DOC.brief_title: SOLX Gold Shunt for Refractory Glaucoma
